questions.subject: Dogs and Air
questions.author: Francisco Sans
questions.content: Did you ever notice that when you blow in a dog's face, he gets mad at you but when you take him on a car ride, he sticks his head out of the window?

questions.subject: Life
questions.author: Arthur Dent
questions.content: What is the meaning of life?

questions.subject: The Leading Brand
questions.author: Philosoraptor
questions.content: If it's 10x better than the leading brand, why isn't it the leading brand?
